name: Raft

description: Raft is a lightweight, full-site-editing compatible (FSE) theme ready for your next website. Raft is a super fast, easily customizable, simple theme. Itâ€™s perfect for blogs, small business, startups, agencies, firms, e-commerce shops (WooCommerce storefront) as well as personal portfolio sites and most types of projects.
